title: I may have the Crab Cake recipe from Faircloth Seafood...went to your site but found no where to enter my information.  Now what?
text:
Chris,



If you go to the answer at http://www.myreporter.com/?p=12576 you
will see a link at the bottom that says Click here to let us know!



Click on that link to leave the recipe and a little information about
how you happened to have it. You will be asked for your name and email
address.
